readable.title: 3307978046_92fef4dfa9
readable.content: a group enjoying a day at the park in their trekkies A group of people in red clothing with scooters ride down the hill on rollerblades . Several children wearing red sweaters are riding tricycles in the park . several people dressed alike are traveling down a curvy road on scooters . The brightly colored rider is riding down a countryside hill on a scooter .
